statements: SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, message_text FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT message_text, conversion_rate FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE audience_segment = 'New Customers';
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, audience_segment FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE conversion_rate < 0.3 AND audience_segment LIKE '%loyal%';
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE conversion_rate > 0.05 ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, message_text FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE audience_segment LIKE '%youth%' ORDER BY campaign_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(conversion_rate) AS average_conversion_rate FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, message_text, conversion_rate FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE audience_segment = 'New Customers' AND conversion_rate < 0.1;
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT message_id, message_text FROM messages WHERE test_group = 2;
SELECT message_text FROM messages WHERE campaign_id = 3 ORDER BY message_id DESC;
SELECT message_id, test_group FROM messages WHERE campaign_id = 4 AND test_group = 1;
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE campaign_id = 5 OR test_group = 2;
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE campaign_id = 1 ORDER BY message_id DESC
SELECT message_text FROM messages WHERE test_group = 2 ORDER BY campaign_id ASC
SELECT message_id, message_text FROM messages WHERE test_group = 1 AND campaign_id = 3
SELECT message_text FROM messages WHERE campaign_id IN (2, 3) AND test_group = 1 ORDER BY campaign_id DESC, message_id ASC
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE test_group = 2 AND campaign_id = 1 ORDER BY message_id ASC
SELECT * FROM campaign_messages;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM user_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT campaign_id, message FROM campaign_messages ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, age, gender FROM user_data WHERE gender = 'female';
SELECT result_id, user_id, conversion_rate FROM test_results WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, email, age FROM user_data WHERE gender = 'male' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT campaign_id, message FROM campaign_messages WHERE campaign_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT user_id, test_date, conversion_rate FROM test_results ORDER BY test_date DESC, conversion_rate ASC;
SELECT user_id, campaign_id, message_variation, conversion_rate FROM test_results WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM campaigns;
SELECT message_id, message FROM campaign_messages WHERE message_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, total_clicks, total_conversions FROM campaign_results ORDER BY total_conversions DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaign_messages;
SELECT message_id, message FROM campaign_messages ORDER BY message_id DESC;
SELECT users.name, campaign_messages.message FROM users JOIN campaign_messages ON users.user_id = campaign_messages.message_id;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_results.campaign_id, AVG(conversion_rate) AS avg_conversion_rate FROM campaign_results GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING avg_conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM messages;
SELECT message_id, message_text, message_type FROM messages WHERE message_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT group_id, group_name, group_description FROM experiment_groups ORDER BY group_id DESC;
SELECT action_id, user_id, campaign_id, action_type, action_timestamp FROM user_actions WHERE action_type = 'click' ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE message_type = 'announcement';
SELECT message_text, message_type FROM messages WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT message_id, message_text FROM messages WHERE campaign_id = 2 ORDER BY message_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM experiment_results WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5 AND group_id = 3;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date ASC, campaign_name DESC;
